item.title: [COLOR lime][B] B I E N V E N I D O S[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] A [/COLOR][COLOR deepskyblue] DIABLO 2.0[/B][/COLOR]

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = "Bienvenido a J.H.G. Master" line2 = "Disfruta de su Contenido" line3 = "Totalmente Gratuito" xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1, line2, line3) return

item.title: [COLOR yellow][B] ADDON CREADO Y DEDICADO A:[/COLOR][/B]

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = "CATOAL,ANGEL, ANABEL " line2 = "GRACIAS " line3 = "Por estar ahi." xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1, line2, line3) return

item.title: [B][COLOR blue]*[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]*[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] * [/COLOR]*[COLOR red]*[/COLOR][COLOR red] y toda la Familia JHG [/COLOR][/B]

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = "FAMILIA " line2 = "GRACIAS " line3 = "OS QUIERO." xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1, line2, line3) return
